pkgmetadata.longdescription: Limited Memory BFGS Minimizer with Bounds on Parameters with optim() 'C' Interface // Interfacing to Nocedal et al. L-BFGS-B.3.0 (2011 doi:10.1145/2049662.2049669) limited memory BFGS minimizer with bounds on parameters. This is a fork of 'lbfgsb3'. This registers a 'R' compatible 'C' interface to L-BFGS-B.3.0 that uses the same function types and optimization as the optim() function (see writing 'R' extensions and source for details). Ths package also adds more stopping criterion as well as allows adjusting more tolerances.
